name: Arbiter

skills.name: Gaze of Justice
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Double hit. Each hit can place Weaken.

skills.notes: Each hit can place Weaken. Useful for boss and wave damage.

skills.name: Enforced Humility
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of decreasing the duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE. 75% chance to decrease buff duration.

skills.notes: Key for Arena and Hydra to strip buffs.

skills.name: Mentor of Heroes
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 30% and places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP if they have less than 50% HP.

effects.notes: Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP if they have less than 50% HP.

skills.notes: Signature speed boost and heal. Core for Arena and PvE.

skills.name: Destiny’s Call
skills.description: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP, then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 20%. Grants an Extra Turn to this Champion if an ally was successfully revived.

effects.notes: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP.
Fills Turn Meter of all allies by 20%.

skills.notes: Revive plus extra turn allows immediate follow-up with A3.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 30%.
forms.comments: Arbiter is the premier speed lead and reviver for Arena, Dungeons, and Doom Tower. Her kit is essential for progression and PvP.

stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 350+ SPD, HP%/DEF% for tank, ACC for debuffing

clan_boss: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (critical for A1 2-hit)
Support: Steadfast (+810 HP for reviver), Pinpoint Accuracy, Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye (TM control synergy with A3), Lore of Steel, Unshakeable (+50 RES for reviver)
dungeons: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (A1 2-hit multi-proc)
Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for Weaken), Swarm Smiter, Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel (boosts Speed set)
arena: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory (speed nuke), Helmsmasher or Flawless Execution

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for Weaken/buff reduction), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel (Speed set boost), Unshakeable (+50 RES for tank), Timely Intervention (TM on ally low HP)
doom_tower: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (A1 2-hit)
Defense: Blastproof, Improved Parry, Delay Death

Support: Steadfast, Lay on Hands (+5% heal when A3 heals), Healing Savior (+10% when ally <40% HP), Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel, Unshakeable (+50 RES), Timely Intervention
faction_wars: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (A1 2-hit)
Defense: Blastproof, Improved Parry, Delay Death
Support: Steadfast, Lay on Hands, Healing Savior, Pinpoint Accuracy, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel, Unshakeable (+50 RES)
general: - GIANT SLAYER: A1 is 2-hit attack → 2 chances for 30% proc = superior for PVE bosses
- Helmsmasher/Flawless Execution: Arena speed nuke builds (pure support role, minimal damage)
- Lore of Steel: CRITICAL for Speed set boost (+15% multiplicative) → maximizes speed lead
- Unshakeable: CRITICAL for reviver role (+50 RES) → avoid being stunned/frozen
- Timely Intervention: +20% TM when ally drops below 25% HP → synergizes with revive/heal role
- Evil Eye: TM control synergy with A3 TM fill → enemy TM reduction on A1
- Lay on Hands + Healing Savior: Boost A3 heal when allies <40% HP
- Eagle Eye + Pinpoint Accuracy: A1 Weaken and A2 buff reduction require ACC
REVIVER PRIORITY: Unshakeable (+50 RES), Steadfast (+810 HP), Timely Intervention
PVE PRIORITY: Giant Slayer for A1 multi-hit, Lore of Steel for Speed set

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use revive and speed boost on auto. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion, but enables speed and revive strategies.

mechanics_advisory: Arbiter is the premier speed lead and reviver for Arena (30% SPD aura), Dungeons, and Doom Tower. A1 2-hit attack benefits from Giant Slayer. A2 AoE decreases buff duration (75% chance). A3 fills TM by 30% + places Increase ATK + heals allies <50% HP. A4 revives all dead allies to 35% HP + fills TM by 20% + grants Extra Turn → instant follow-up with A3 for full team recovery. Build for maximum SPD (350+ Arena, 250+ dungeons), HP%/DEF% for tank, ACC for Weaken/buff reduction. Lore of Steel CRITICAL for Speed set boost. Unshakeable CRITICAL for reviver role (avoid disruption).

update_notes.last_patch: MAJOR UPDATE: Added complete masteries section with Giant Slayer synergy (A1 2-hit multi-proc), Lore of Steel (CRITICAL for Speed set boost), Unshakeable (CRITICAL for reviver role), Timely Intervention (TM on ally low HP), Lay on Hands/Healing Savior (heal boost), Eagle Eye/Pinpoint Accuracy (ACC for Weaken/buff reduction), and content-specific recommendations. Expanded mechanics_advisory with strategic guidance. Added validation_sources.
